The purpose of the survey was to include the highest number of persons from the economic elite of Hungary. One part of the interviewed persons were taken from economic magazines, journals, dailies, from the "Compass Hungarian Economic Company Register", from the "Handbook of Hungarian Public Life", from the "Big and middée-rage companies of Hungary 1996" book, and then a »snowball« method was used.
